name: Priority
description: Priority codes for ordering and processing clinical requests

values.description: As soon as possible (a priority lower than stat)
values.definition: Urgent priority level below stat for clinical requests requiring expedited processing

values.description: Preoperative (to be done prior to surgery)
values.definition: Priority for procedures that must be completed before surgical intervention
Standard priority for normal processing workflow
Highest priority requiring immediate attention and processing

values.description: Timing critical (do as near as possible to requested time)
values.definition: Time-sensitive priority requiring precise scheduling coordination

notes: Essential for clinical workflow prioritization and resource allocation
